The circumstances under which he left the Robin Caplin firm were not favorable. Joe is very well connected, having spent most of his time networking. There is the possibility that there are some things in Joe's past that he is not particularly proud of. He is a politician and anything that will promote his career, he will use. Said differently, he talks a great game but is probably marginal on the legal issues.
